item.title: DOH DNS over HTTPS
item.description: Security DNS di sisi client Install dnscrypt-proxy add-apt-repository ppa:shevchuk/dnscrypt-proxy apt update apt install dnscrypt-proxy Edit file /etc/dnscrypt-proxy/dnscrypt-proxy.toml dan rubah variabel server_name menjadi seperti contoh berikut: server_names = ['cloudflare', 'google'] lalu restart service dnscrypt-proxy systemctl restart dnscrypt-proxy edit /etc/resolv.conf agar mengarah ke dnscrypt-proxy nameserver 127.0.2.1 Install DNS over HTTPS server Install dengan cara paket instalasi deb wget "https://www.aaflalo.me/?smd_process_download=1&download_id=1326" mv index* doh-server.deb dpkg -i doh-server_*_amd64.deb Install dengan cara compile wget https://dl.google.com/go/go1.13.linux-amd64.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.
